entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
